name: Furrmidable Foes
description:
Venture the world of magic in a war between the magical cats and robotic dogs.

Furrmidable Foes is a 3D Twin-Stick (Dual-Stick) Top Down Shooter. with novel mechanics and an original story of a fight against the corrupt evil that has taken over the forest regions of Meowth in a century old battle of cats versus dogs.
